official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for door delivery of mail to the physically handicapped, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1981

summary.text: Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1981 - Requires, upon approval of an application which includes a physician's certification of need, the delivery of mail to the door of handicapped individuals.

titles.title: Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1981
A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for door delivery of mail to the physically handicapped, and for other purposes.
